languages.text: "В последний раз я управлял чем-то подобным еще до рождения первого внука... Но ничего, как только доберусь до рычагов — руки вспомнят".
"The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."
languages.original_text: "В последний раз я управлял чем-то подобным еще до рождения первого внука... Но ничего, как только доберусь до рычагов — руки вспомнят".

traits.locale_text: "The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will come back once I get my hands on the levers."
"The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will come back once I get my hands on the levers."
"The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."
"The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."
"The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."
"The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."

languages.text: «La última vez que conduje uno de estos fue antes de tener a mi primer nieto... pero lo recordaré todo en cuanto ponga las manos en las palancas».
languages.original_text: "The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."

traits.locale_text: «La última vez que conduje uno de estos fue antes de tener a mi primer nieto... pero lo recordaré todo en cuanto ponga las manos en las palancas».

languages.text: “我上次开这样的坦克，还是我第一个孙子出生之前……不过，只要我把手放在操纵杆上，之前的驾驶技术就全都回想起来了。”
languages.original_text: "The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."

traits.locale_text: “我上次开这样的坦克，还是我第一个孙子出生之前……不过，只要我把手放在操纵杆上，之前的驾驶技术就全都回想起来了。”

languages.text: 「最後にこのようなものを運転したのは、孫が生まれる前でした…しかし、レバーを手に握ればすぐに思い出すでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."

traits.locale_text: 「最後にこのようなものを運転したのは、孫が生まれる前でした…しかし、レバーを手に握ればすぐに思い出すでしょう」

languages.text: « La dernière fois que j'ai piloté un engin de ce genre, je n'étais pas encore grand-père... Enfin, ça ne s'oublie pas, et tout me reviendra une fois aux commandes. »
languages.original_text: "The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."

traits.locale_text: « La dernière fois que j'ai piloté un engin de ce genre, je n'étais pas encore grand-père... Enfin, ça ne s'oublie pas, et tout me reviendra une fois aux commandes. »

languages.text: "En son böyle bir şeyi ilk torunum doğmadan önce kullanmıştım... Kollara dokunduğum anda her şeyi hatırlarım."
languages.original_text: "The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."

traits.locale_text: "En son böyle bir şeyi ilk torunum doğmadan önce kullanmıştım... Kollara dokunduğum anda her şeyi hatırlarım."

languages.text: "Als ich so etwas zuletzt gesteuert habe, hatte ich noch keine Enkel ... Aber sobald meine Hände auf den Hebeln liegen, fällt mir alles wieder ein."
languages.original_text: "The last time I drove something like this was before I had my first grandchild... But it will all come back to me once I get my hands on the levers."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich so etwas zuletzt gesteuert habe, hatte ich noch keine Enkel ... Aber sobald meine Hände auf den Hebeln liegen, fällt mir alles wieder ein."
